Html: Has anybody had any experience with using 3rd party catalogs from companies publishing them for use in SCUP or SCCM 2012? Will WPP accept these updates? I am specifically interested if it with work with Shavlik Patch.
I use the catalogs within WPP from Adobe for FlashPlayer and the Adobe Reader. WPP comes with Catalogs for HP, Fujitsu, DELL and HP. Do you have other catalogs for free?

Hi mcgeornc, if catalogs made by shavlik are made to work with SCUP and SCCM, they will works with WPP too.

You can certainly download free catalogs from Shavlik to test them.
Thanks! I will do that. Shavlik is not free but I can get a demo set to work with.
